text.autoconfig.gamma_utils.title: Gamma Utils Config
text.autoconfig.gamma_utils.option.defau: Gamma percentage for when the mod is toggled off
text.autoconfig.gamma_utils.option.toggl: Gamma percentage for when the mod is toggled on
text.autoconfig.gamma_utils.option.gamma: Gamma percentage change for every increase or decrease
text.autoconfig.gamma_utils.option.advan: Should the mod enforce the minimum and maximum gamma limits
Minimum gamma percentage the mod will allow if the Limit Check is enabled
Maximum gamma percentage the mod will allow if the Limit Check is enabled
Disabling this will reset the gamma value set by the mod every time Minecraft closes
